How Likely Is It? Mathematical Reflections

text: In this unit we are continuing to explore rational numbers, including operations and their properties with positive, negative numbers and zero and how to recognize and use these operations to solve problems. At the end of this Investigation, What do you know about rational numbers and their operations?
